value:
$WmMPID_年明アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_NewYear20,Face|Happy New Year, all! Everyone looks
wonderful, of course. I expected
nothing less.$k$p$WmMPID_比翼シャロン,ch00_01_Alfons_MF_Pair,Face|Thanks! You look great too!$k$p$nMPID_比翼アルフォンス|Happy New Year, Commander, and
thank you. But might I ask...$k$pWhere did you source the funds for
these extravagant outfits?$k$p$WmMPID_年明エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_NewYear20,Face|Yes, it must have been expensive to
provide for the Order of Heroes...
Not to mention me...$k$p$WmMPID_年明アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_NewYear20,Face|Oh, don't fuss over trivialities like
that. It was no big deal.$k$pYour enterprising commander already
has plans to recoup the expenses,
rest assured!$k$p$WmMPID_比翼アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_MF_Pair,Face|Not the pictures again. Please say it
isn't the pictures again.$k$p$WmMPID_年明アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_NewYear20,Face|Of course not! Relax! I've totally
moved on from the picture racket.$k$pThe market's constantly changing,
you know. Got to keep up.$k$p$WmMPID_比翼シャロン,ch00_01_Alfons_MF_Pair,Face|So you're not planning to exploit this
for profit, somehow? Commander...
Are you feeling all right?$k$p$WmMPID_年明アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_NewYear20,Face|Fine, thanks! Anyway, let's all head
down to the shrine.$k$pI'd like us to pray for peace in Askr,
and prosperity in the new year!$k$p$WmMPID_比翼アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_MF_Pair,Face|I hate it when I can't see her angle...$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_比翼アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_MF_Pair,Face|Lovely weather for ushering in the
new year, wouldn't you say?$k$p$nMPID_比翼シャロン|Yep! Let's make sure we've got our
resolutions. Mine's to befriend 1,000
Heroes. What's yours, Eir?$k$p$WmMPID_年明エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_NewYear20,Face|I suppose it must be...to find a reason
to live, as you all have.$k$p$WmMPID_年明アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_NewYear20,Face|I'm really enjoying all this positive
energy, but just a little reminder...$k$pThese outfits WERE pricey, so try not
to get carried away and ruin them
with stains, OK?$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_年明アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_NewYear20,Face|All right, that's enough! Back off,
everybody, or these outfits'll be
a mess to get clean!$k$p$WmMPID_比翼アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_MF_Pair,Face|Much as I might object to your...
priorities, you're right—it would be
foolish to press on. Let us retreat.$k$p$Sbs150|
